post.body: do you need help?
Speaking from experience, a good 2 hour open bar is better than an always open crappy bar.
Sounds good to me. Good luck recouperating! :-)
how about 23?
Mr Js dad bought the car without telling mr j b/c Mr J had to travel. I think Mr J is considering buying. He signed something ...
icepick is overdone. Try a hand drill...
@bluesman1103 is only right if it is the original film and not the Keanu remake.
Oooh Metro Burger....
Can you right click and join as an admin?
When it came out, Howard the Duck, scared the crap out of me. Especially when Ferris' pricipal transforms into something. Creepy!
An @RCBP favorite is "She Told me she was Legal, Charlie Brown."
Thanks!
I made the mistake of going to a restaurant at lunch where the tea tasted like pickles. Eeew!
Wow! Totally don't feel so bad now, Thanks! I'm down to close to 2k now, still have more to go through, LOL.
@cheriepie, There's a setting under My Books/apps for the good reads update. I played with it for a bit... I LOVE goodreads, LOL
I just got them to ofer something based on a rate att offered. You might be able to as well.
I hope you feel better soon! I mean, you know, get better. You'll be feeling better in no time. :-)
Mission acomplished. My mom says hi!
63.... I think.
twitpic?
do you want gaffigan tickets for tonight in cleveland?
We need to have a cape cod night. I should carry some in a thermos. How's the bottle doing?
Do you have a GPS locator on the poor old boy's collar?
found him next to little tykes section. Xmas shopping is officially done.
Listening to Pink floyd in the car on way to look for Mr J's ipod touch.
If water were tequila, I'd be home now.
http://twitpic.com/pyk8 - Perfection
We are at el jalepenos. Yay!
Mr J says he could break your window...
Situation resolved! I negotiated with pretzel sticks and a promise that I would fix their spreadsheet in the morning!
My phone is being held for ransom by someone. Just got a call on my workphone that people will get dialed if I don't provide snackage.
http://twitpic.com/px7o - Vendor sent us an advent calendar!
One of the words in my phone's auto fill is Pangea. Gotta love HTC!
http://twitpic.com/pwfq - Rocking the audiobook at work.
If you or someone else you know collects action figures and wouldn't mind a quick interview for an article, please DM me... Thanks!
Now Stingers Sports bar radio is playing Lonestar. I think he's trying to dance with her in front of the TV playing the Jack LaLane juic ...
Gotta admire a guy who chats up a chick at the bar during lunch. Especially when serenaded by the smooth sounds of REO Speedwagon.
Same Grandmama plays Halo on XBox and video poker and refers to anyone riding a bus as 'those old people.'
Just signed up for unlimited texting for myself, MrJ & Grandmama. It took her 3 months to make a call, so I'm not worried.
Spock just hit Archer's enterprise in a space ship derby yelling 'way 2 kill the franchise, Bakula!'
3 minutes in and they've already cracked a Mickey Rourke joke!
Apparently Mr J can tell the diference between 1080i and 1080p. Guess we will have to get hd package.
Just left workplace and bought Marilyn sign. Mr J just bought an iPod touch and dissed Batman.
Tried to tel my mom the embodiment of everything evilmay still live in canton, but Mom hates Akron.
Spending morning with the Fam in Canton. Shudder.
Will send people youtube link of Are you Being served Punch & Judy episode. Maybe that'll explain it.
Advent calendar shows a punch and judy show. I am the only one who knows what that is. I don't understand how that is possible.
Going down to the warehouse to find some boxes to send to @bluesman1103.
Twitterverse, I need your help STAT! If you're reading this, please help me make @bluesman1103's day go better. Send him a joke or pic plz.
Not sure about the action undertrack (gunshots, driving noises) for David Baldacci's Divine Justice Audiobook. It's a bit disconcerting.
Most of the back office has broken out into "I want a hippo. for Xmas" and it looks like they have choreography. Should I be scared?
Wow! Hey there, @JoeQuesada... Welcome to Twitter!
Actually wearing trousers to work today. They were pressed and in a dry cleaning bag in suitcase. I forgot I had trousers
This is the only time you can shop without a retail license and we are open until 10.
Today is the friends and family sale where I work. If you will be in Medina county, stop by and get half of wholesale prices on sigs, ho ...
les and more.
Oh the salesman is going to try and be sneaky against the sales manager...He is our friend... Wink wink
If we buy, Subaru will make $250 donation to ASPCA.
I don't like high pressure sales.
I guess he was close to lake anna today. Maybe he uses a hearse, just in case it ever happens.
Talking about the worst weatherman ever. Dick G is giving us a lot of reasons to be scared.
Just ordered Hungry Howie's.Other than Donato's, I don't really like pizza.But cold pizza with banana peppers is really good.Weird,but good.
You know, for being nicknamed after my favorite Superhero's nemisis, Mr J was actually a real sweetie today!Should I rename myself Harley Q?
I loved Fred Claus, only one part was like J. Claus saves Christmas. Now downloading lectures from iTunesU...
Soundtrack!
Surfing bird is prominently featured in fred claus. Now I have a reason to buy the soundt
Probably not going anywhere tonight. Fam visit went well. Love cheeseburger in paradise!
Day went really well, but now wather is getting icky. Going home.
SOmehow mr j has persuaded me to car shop before we meet fam.
BF has sauerkraut & sausage for dinner. I want a brie and ham baguette (I've had them before and they're fab despite being pork-filled).
I am probably a little late on this but when did wordpress' Dashboard change?
Yay @CandieB! My goal is 100 and I am around 91.t
Mr J's sister is having a purse party, open house in Akron on 21 Jan. 3 hours to go in, look and buy purses at LOW prices. DM if interested!
3/4 done with Christmas shopping. I guess maybe buying early versus going out on Xmas eve MIGHT be a little cooler.
Photos from impromptu family holiday photoshoot at World Market are surprisingly good. Must take photos at retail stores from now on!
Singstar for PS3 was $15 and came with 2 microphones that I could podcast with. Woo Hoo!
Heading to BJ's in the Falls. I wore flip flops despite the 2 inches of snow.
Representative named James Woods is responding to my Time Warner issue. Could it really be James Woods, of J.W. High School fame, perhaps?
Thinking I need to start thinking of books to read on vacation. Any ideas? I'm thinking of buying tipping the velvet, audio of Snuff.
http://twitpic.com/rg1z - at least it's organic acid?
Just bought some more stuff on etsy...Not a good thing. I think I'm hooked. Anyone else feeling/not feeling etsy.com lately? Why or why not?
Netflix is sending "Run Fatboy, Run" today. Anyone seen it? What do you think?
My bottle of water tastes like baby aspirin. Maybe it'll get rid of my headache???
Trying to finish up voicework for rest of the year, but the darn tech keeps getting errors.
RIP Bettie Page: http://tinyurl.com/5w4b4n
Huge line at jo-ann's.
AT&T wireless users: I have unlimited data. I can use my phone as a modem for my laptop, correct?
Not to complain but I like iced tea and I like pickles. But pickle-flavored tea is really nasty!
The edict straight from Skeletor: GothamGal has ruined Christmas. Film at 11.
I just downloaded @evernote's mobile app for my phone. Already have the app for my home/work computers... And I love it!
Addressing company christmas cards to overseas vendors and going through yahoo mail. 4000 messages. When did I stop organizing? May 18 '06.
Found my download in the java folder, of all places. Thanks AT&T!
Windows mobile has swallowed my download!What is the appropriate inappriopriate expletive?
Just followed my first twiter link on my smartphone to read @stephenfry 's post on mobiles. Smashing!
Your store has 'paper factory' in the name. Don't look at me like an idiot if I ask if you have either paper or envelopes and say 'No!'
I went blonde!
http://twitpic.com/rnyp - Happiness
Office partychick put snowmen orns on everyone's cubicle next to their name tags. Except for the 3 of us in Purchasing. She hates us.
Re-signed up for stamps.com in the hopes that it will get me caught up on mailings. Have about 6 boxes that need to go out. Aggh!
Best @Bluesman1103 quote ever: 'Dick Goddard is the "Willard" of squirrels.'
Guess who's going to Flogging Molly in Feb 09? ME!!!! Now I have to secure tickets to No Doubt and all will be good!
Watching new librarian movie while playing star wars life
Mr J willingly put on XMas music on radio. It is the song '!#ck Christmas', but it is a step in the right direction.
Stopping for gas at Goasis nar Grandpa's Cheesebarn. Yay!
House went above and beyond with decorations. Will post video later...My first from cell phone!
Heading to green to see christmas lights...
Going to recruit a 7 year old and a 2 year old to help me finish the Christmas tags I need to do... I love that they work for stickers!
Trying to get rid of Jim Gaffigan tickets is hard. I guess we're not the only ones who don't want to see him at Playhouse Square tonight.
Drinking cape cods and fixed potent gin and juice for mr j. Laid back with my mind on my money....
Anyone doing something exciting tonight?
3 games later Mr J has decided we can go home. Will play bioshock or NFSU:Undercover.
Explaining 'Family Guy's' 'Greatest American Hero' reference to Mr J is even harder the second time.
Spent last hour at mr js sister with sick baby.
Mr J's present went over well. Still can't believe he's 30. Off to go sexy-fy my hair.
Playing the a team drinking game.
Mr J needs to turn 30 more often.
12 oz of pure heaven cooked on a slab of stone in excess of 700 degrees.
Loving steak on a stone.
Hour plus wait at Outback? Steak on a stone it is!
Stage 1 of Operation No More LayZBoy for dog is complete. Disposing of chair is stage 2.
Dog wash was a success.
Old man walks by. Has wolverine haircut. AWESOME!
Lost Mr J in Big Lots. We're shopping for his stepmonster.
Settled on the house bunny. I bought Sarah Marshal, Georgia Rule and Chinatown.
Did I mention Mr J is claustrophobic?
Mr J migh be working at the salt mines. Hi ho hi ho...
'he owed money to money loaners.' direct quote from stimulating conversation.
Shelaighleigh talk has turned into fly fishing. Please help me!
We are celebrating with friends. Um yeah.
I want to watch Elves...but I don't have a vhs player.
